ingredients.item: 200g pack essential Waitrose Thin British Smoked Back Bacon Rashers, chopped
300g pack essential Waitrose Cup Mushrooms, sliced

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, drain and return to the pan.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the bacon for 2 minutes. Add the mushrooms and fry for a further 2 minutes. Add the paprika and cherry tomatoes, cover and cook for 5 minutes, squashing the tomatoes slightly towards the end.
Stir into the pasta and heat through for 1 minute, then serve.
